name: The Unknown Scrols
description:
You are a wizard aprentice.  You lived with your master in his castle and studied hard. Unfortunately one day something went terribly wrong and your home filled with vicious monsters and your master disappeared. You have to defend yourself and your only weapons are magic scrolls your master left behind. Unfortunately, you have no idea what they do... Will they cast a fireball? Will they crush you under the huge piano? Who knows? But you have no choice...

Game Created during Slavic Game Jam 2017 #SGJ17

Game have twitch integration.
